text: Guarea cedrata - MHNT Guarea cedrata, also called light bossé or scented guarea, is a species of plant in the family Meliaceae. It is found in Cameroon, the Republic of the Congo, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Ivory Coast, Ghana, Liberia, Nigeria, Sierra Leone, and Uganda. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==External links== * cedrata Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Flora of Cameroon Category:Flora of the Republic of the Congo Category:Flora of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Flora of Ivory Coast Category:Flora of Ghana Category:Flora of Liberia Category:Flora of Nigeria Category:Flora of Sierra Leone Category:Flora of Uganda Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Guarea cedrata
